table.name: SparePart
table.data: INSERT INTO .dbo.SparePart ([ID],[ItemID],[UnitLocationID],[Quantity]) SELECT SP.[ID],I.[ID],UL.[LocationID],SP.[QTY] from .dbo.SpareParts as SP join .dbo.InvItems as I on SP.[ITEMKEY] = I.[KEY] join .dbo.Units as U on SP.[EQUIPKEY] = U.[KEY] join .dbo.UnitLinkages as UL on U.id = UL.id
